title: Thuận An
text:
Thuận An is a <a href="Provincial%20city%20%28Vietnam%29">city</a> of <a href="B%C3%ACnh%20D%C6%B0%C6%A1ng%20Province">Bình Dương Province</a> in the <a href="Southeast%20%28Vietnam%29">Southeast</a> region of Vietnam. As of January 1, 2014 the city had a population of 438,922. The town covers an area of 83.7 km². The center of this town - <a href="L%C3%A1i%20Thi%C3%AAu">Lái Thiêu</a> - is famous for its ceramic and fruits.
Administrative divisions.
Thuận An has 9 <a href="Ward%20%28Vietnam%29">wards</a> (<a href="L%C3%A1i%20Thi%C3%AAu">Lái Thiêu</a>, <a href="An%20Th%E1%BA%A1nh%2C%20B%C3%ACnh%20D%C6%B0%C6%A1ng">An Thạnh</a>, <a href="V%C4%A9nh%20Ph%C3%BA">Vĩnh Phú</a>, <a href="B%C3%ACnh%20H%C3%B2a%2C%20Thu%E1%BA%ADn%20An">Bình Hòa</a>, <a href="B%C3%ACnh%20Chu%E1%BA%A9n">Bình Chuẩn</a>, <a href="Thu%E1%BA%ADn%20Giao">Thuận Giao</a>, <a href="An%20Ph%C3%BA%2C%20Thu%E1%BA%ADn%20An">An Phú</a>, <a href="H%C6%B0ng%20%C4%90%E1%BB%8Bnh">Hưng Định</a> and <a href="B%C3%ACnh%20Nh%C3%A2m">Bình Nhâm</a>) and one <a href="Rural%20commune%20%28Vietnam%29">rural commune</a> (<a href="An%20S%C6%A1n%2C%20B%C3%ACnh%20D%C6%B0%C6%A1ng">An Sơn</a>).
Geography.
Thuận An borders <a href="D%C4%A9%20An">Dĩ An</a> to the <a href="east">east</a>.
Thuận An borders <a href="Th%E1%BB%A7%20D%E1%BA%A7u%20M%E1%BB%99t">Thủ Dầu Một</a> to the <a href="north">north</a>.
Thuận An borders <a href="District%2012%2C%20Ho%20Chi%20Minh%20City">District 12</a> to the <a href="west">west</a>.
Thuận An borders <a href="Th%E1%BB%A7%20%C4%90%E1%BB%A9c">Thủ Đức</a> to the <a href="south">south</a>.
